item.description:
2012 is coming to an end! So come with us and enjoy six hours of continuous entertainment in downtown Rockport.

 

 

NEW YEAR’S ROCKPORT EVE is dedicated to celebration. They celebrate the future, the joy of sharing a special evening with family, friends and neighbors and the hope that a New Year will bring good health, happiness and new opportunities.

The great folks in Rockport will entertain us with; clowns, cowboys, magicians, story tellers, MUSICIANS - classical, pop, jazz, Dixieland, folk, country, gospel swing, reggae, and rock and roll – ventriloquists, dance, drama, puppets, art exhibits, and much, much more! The whole town will be hopping, everywhere!!!

Wow, I've spent new years eve here twice in the past, and each time was magical, entertaining, and so much fun! The Reggae band was incredible! The Irish dancers were amazing! Oh, and the Steel Drum Band, mesmerizing to say the least! Hey, gota tell ya, for a small little village, Rockport sure has an explosion of energy on this night! They even have an old timer Engineer conducting a small train around the town square for those that could use a ride, or for the kid in all of us...... and if you like to dance, dance, dance these bands are for you, you, you!!!

Right now the folks in Rockport are still planning, so please come back and visit this posting in November and early December for details about the entertainment line-up, maps, meetup location, and carpool/transportation information. Buttons for admission cost ($15 adults, $6 children 12 & under, 3 & under, free–no button needed) and are now available. Information about purchasing buttons in advance is forthcoming.

• Plenty of on street parking downtown Rockport, no meters!

• Carpooling will be coordinated

• Advance ticket purchases are available ~ email Dana for payment

• A schedule of events is still unavailable at this time. Expect it within a couple of weeks.

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: New Year's Rockport Eve (ROCK-N' ROCKPORT!)
